entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow mixed with rain. High plus 4.
